name: Dark Beta ChessTempo
description:
A dark theme for the beta portion of ChessTempo.

Made by The Zyrax
additional_info:
Releases: 
2017-06-20 v1.04
2017-06-11 v1.03
2017-06-10 v1.02
2017-06-09 v1.01
2017-06-08 v1.00

[Changelog v1.03-v1.04]
Fixed quotes and comments and links in problem chat. Fixed so dark theme works when zoomed in with an expandable header. First implementation on playing online.

[Changelog v1.02-v1.03]
Fixed some bugs and checkboxes and switches.

[Changelog v1.01-v1.02]
Added 35 elements. Overall improvements and expanded to the whole beta site.

[Changelog v1.00-v1.01]
Put "!important" after every color and styled the Blog.



Made by The Zyrax
